description:
Hello!

This month we'll have a special edition. We'll move our typical Wednesday to Thursday, 10th of May, to be part of the Start & Scale Week agenda ( http://scaleupporto.pt/start-scale-2018/ ) - A week dedicated to the promotion of innovation, entrepreneurship and technology in Porto, promoted by ScaleUp Porto ( http://scaleupporto.pt/ ).

As a special edition, we'll also have a special agenda. We are organizing it together with Porto Design Accelerator ( https://portodesignaccelerator.com/ ) and Porto Tech Hub ( https://portotechhub.com/ ).

AGENDA:
18:30 - Check-in and welcome
19:00 - Porto Design Accelerator Showcase - Meet the program and some startups
19:30 - Meet Porto Tech Hub Conference and have a glass of Port Wine

See you there!
-----------------
PS. Don't forget to check the whole Start & Scale Week agenda.
Some recommended events:
Content
- Masterclass: Rewarding Talent: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/masterclass-rewarding-talent-tickets-43755085639
- Masterclass: How we acquired Agility in our industry: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/masterclass-how-we-acquired-agility-in-our-industry-tickets-44984525928
- Problem solving with Data Science: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/problem-solving-with-data-science-tickets-44150778166
- Masterclass: Defense-in-depth techniques for modern web applications and Google's journey with CSP: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/masterclass-defense-in-depth-techniques-for-modern-web-applications-and-googles-journey-with-csp-tickets-43752723574
- Scale Me Up! with Filipe Araújo: https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/scale-me-up-with-filipe-araujo-tickets-44110931985

Parties & Networking:
- Warm Up Party: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/warm-up-party-start-scale-week-2018-tickets-43881514792
- Closing Party: https://www.facebook.com/events/1804774162915921/
name: Porto Startup Coffee Meetup #74
